tool_description: List of Hospital in Indonesia. You can get information about hospital code, hospital name, Province, classes, and owner
title: Hospital Indonesia

api_list.name: Get Hospital by Province
api_list.description: This Endpoint will Give you information about Hospital by Province

api_list.name: Get Hospital By Name
api_list.description: This endpoint will give you information about hospital by name

api_list.name: Get All Hospital in Indonesia
api_list.description: This endpoint will give all of data about hospital in indonesia
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hospital-indonesia.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hospital-indonesia.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
